text:
If i try o create new passwords file, i get the error. So as:

htpasswd -c c:\ttt 
admin
or
htpasswd -n admin

returns the message:
htpasswd: -c and -n options 
conflict

If i've created the "c:\ttt" file, and try to use
htpasswd c:\ttt admin

I have 
a message, that process cannot access the file, file is locked. 0 files copied.

Why?
creator: vital@radio.odessa.ua
jefft@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 3188
Patch that seems to fix reload bug in input modules.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
Htpasswd was significantly changed for 2.0.42.  Please update and reopen
  this report if the fixes do not resolve your issues.
